name: DeleteCallRecording
description: Delete a recording from your account

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Recording resources to delete.

CallSid.description: The [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) SID of the resources to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Recording resource to delete.
